snippet: Mr. Cioffi’s scathing critique of Sigmund Freud’s work was one of the opening salvos in the bitter debate in recent decades over the legitimacy of psychoanalytic theories.
abstract: Frank Cioffi, American philosopher who wrote a groundbreaking critique of Freudian psychoanalytic theory, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cioffi’s scathing critique of Sigmund Freud’s work was one of the opening salvos in the bitter debate in recent decades over the legitimacy of psychoanalytic theories.

headline.main: Frank Cioffi, Philosopher and Critic of Freud, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Frank Cioffi, 83, Philosopher and a Critic of Freud
